text: An earthquake struck the Mexican state of Oaxaca at 10:29 local time on June 23, 2020. It was a magnitude of 7.4 . The epicenter was from San Miguel del Puerto and south-southwest of Santa María Zapotitlán. The quake was felt by a 49 million people in Mexico and Guatemala. Some tremors were felt as far away as . Thousands of houses in Oaxaca were damaged and 10 deaths were reported. A tsunami warning was issued for southern Mexico, El Salvador, Guatemala, and Honduras. ==References== Category:2020 in North America Category:2020s disasters in North America Category:2020s in Mexico Category:Earthquakes in Mexico Category:2020 earthquakes Category:June 2020 events 2020 earthquake
title: 2020 Oaxaca earthquake
